bibl.title: Yale Papyri in the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library. Volume II
bibl.note: xxxvii-167 pp. et XV pll. dont 3 dépl.
bibl.seg: Stephens Susan A., Yale Papyri in the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library II. (American Studies in Papyrology. 24.)
Chico, California, Scholars Press, 1985, 4°, xxxvii-167 pp. et XV pll. dont 3 dépl.

C.R. par G.D. Kilpatrick, VigChr 41 (1987) pp. 306-308. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 61 (1986) No. 122, pp. 335-339. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 104 (1987) pp. 889-890. - Claude Wehrli, BibO 44 (1987) coll. 680-681. - W.E.H. Cockle, Enchoria 16 (1988) pp. 169-173. - A.M. Devine, CB 65 (1989) pp. 119-120. - Bärbel Kramer, JEA 75 (1989) pp. 291-295.
